I hope this message finds you well.

 

This is the fourth instance of water leakage at the same location in the Versace Young boutique, with issues arising from different areas of the roof slab.

 

I am in the process of preparing quotes for the necessary rectification works, which include replacing the water-damaged gypsum ceiling, faulty lights, and devices.

This is the fourth instance of water leakage at the same location in the Versace Young boutique, with issues arising from different areas of the roof slab.

 

I am in the process of preparing quotes for the necessary rectification works, which include replacing the water-damaged gypsum ceiling, faulty lights, and devices.

 

Before proceeding with these repairs, I kindly request confirmation that the roof slab waterproofing works have been completed. This step is essential to ensure we prevent further inconvenience in the future.

 

Once I receive confirmation from your end, I will proceed with the rectification works accordingly.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and I look forward to your response. 

 

 

Thanks again, for your usual support 

Best Regards

Subject: Water leakage issue Versace Young DM ‼️ 

 

 

Dear Cherry, 

 

I hope you’re doing well.

 

I wanted to bring to your attention an urgent water leakage issue we are currently facing at one of our stores, Versace Young. After investigating, i have identified that the leakage is originating from the roof slab.

 

As discussed, we require your immediate assistance in addressing this matter as a top priority. Your prompt action will be greatly appreciated to prevent any further damage or disruption to the store’s operations.

 

Picture and video attached FYR 

 

Thanks for your usual support 

Best regards

Subject: Re: Water leakage issue Versace Young DM ‼️ 

 

Dear Cherry,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

This is the fourth instance of water leakage at the same location in the Versace Young boutique, with issues arising from different areas of the roof slab.

 

I am in the process of preparing quotes for the necessary rectification works, which include replacing the water-damaged gypsum ceiling, faulty lights, and devices.

This is the fourth instance of water leakage at the same location in the Versace Young boutique, with issues arising from different areas of the roof slab.

 

I am in the process of preparing quotes for the necessary rectification works, which include replacing the water-damaged gypsum ceiling, faulty lights, and devices.

 

Before proceeding with these repairs, I kindly request confirmation that the roof slab waterproofing works have been completed. This step is essential to ensure we prevent further inconvenience in the future.

 

Once I receive confirmation from your end, I will proceed with the rectification works accordingly.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and I look forward to your response. 

 

 

Thanks again, for your usual support 

Best Regards
